page.title: 02NOTTINGHAM-GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: In the playground we play a lot of catching and hiding games.One hiding game is called{HIDE AND SEEK.}First we dip.(A dip is a rhyme we use to pick who is'on').This is a rhyme we use "Boy scout walk out."The person who is 'on'counts to a certain number while everybody hides.At home some people have computers.One game is called{ {'BIRD STRIKE.'}In this game you are a tank and you are shooting planes.When you shoot the wing of a plane a pigeon flies across the screen.You shoot the pigeon to get a musical note at the top of the screen.On holiday we have sandcastle making competitions to see who can make the best sandcastle.We play ball games too.We play games like football, stoolball, baseball, cricket and rounders. { { {
